title: i can't login to the game..
body:
https://s14.postimg.org/blimjl91d/image.jpg

https://s4.postimg.org/re1zplp8t/111.jpg

anyone who encounter this type of error?? please help..

replies.body: i already did everything but nothing change.. even the other guide didnt help me at all..{{item:3070}}
i already try hextect repair tool and nothing happen..

This general connection error usually indicates there's an issue with your computer reaching our servers. In this case, it specifically looks like your connection issue is specifically to the login servers. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if any of your local network settings are currently incompatible with League.

Let me know if anything changed as a result of these steps.
